segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children over by the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is standing on a wobbly-looking two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach into that "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's trying to be very quiet about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out; it appears quite unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really think it's going to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand open, ready to catch some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated little cookie heist they're attempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their task, completely oblivious to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman behind them is lost in her own world of dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous little faces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to end in either triumph or a loud crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
